articles.author: Lisa Respers France
articles.title: Drew Barrymore defends plans to resume talk show amid entertainment strikes - CNN
articles.description: Drew Barrymore is drawing the ire of the Writers Guild of America over her decision to resume production on her talk show as more than 11,000 television and film writers remain on strike.
articles.content:
Drew Barrymore is drawing the ire of the Writers Guild of America over her decision to resume production on her talk show as more than 11,000 television and film writers remain on strike.

articles.author: Greg Norman
articles.title: American who helped save Mark Dickey speaks about 'dire' situation during Turkish cave rescue - Fox News
articles.description: Carl Heitmeyer, an American who helped with the effort to rescue Mark Dickey from a cave in Turkey, says there were “no flat spots to walk on" and “no flat surfaces" inside.
articles.content: An American who helped with the rescue of caver Mark Dickey after he became trapped more than 3,000 feet underground in Turkey is now speaking out about the "dire" situation his friend faced, saying … [+2471 chars]
